title: Android developer NEW!
full_description: Position : Android Developer Location : Columbus, OH Duration : 12+ Months ÂResponsibilities :Ââ 5-7 years of related work experience in Android . â Bachelor's Degree from an accredited university in Business Administration, Information Sciences or other quantitative field of studyâ Strong ability to elicit and document business requirements, and identify potential issuesâ Excellent verbal and written communication skills including ability to communicate clearly and effectively in support of detailed problem solving, managerial escalation and status reporting.â Knowledge of SDLC's including exposure to Agile methodologiesâ Some knowledge of user experience concepts is helpful.â Ability to build relationships with clients and partners, and work with multiple levels of managementâ Strong teamwork and collaboration skills â Ability to manage multiple and sometimes changing priorities against aggressive schedulesâ Advanced skills in business management tools including: Microsoft PowerPoint, Word, Excel, Visio, Project, Access and SharePointâ Desired Candidate Characteristics:â Detail oriented; strong organization, prioritization & follow up and follow through skillsâ Excellent listening skills and ability to articulate ideasâ Analytical thinker and problem solverâ Intellectually curious, quick study who will learn the business quickly,â Proactive problem solver who will actively engage in thoughtful debate.â Conscientious, hard-working individual with strong time management skillsâ Strong interpersonal and relationship building skillsâ Ability to work well within a team or independently
